title: Duplicity
overview: Freya Parker shines in this stylish film noir produced by Axel Braun and directed by James Avalon, as a woman consumed by jealousy when her best friend marries the man she loves. She remains friends with both, but only to exact the ultimate revenge by sabotaging their marriage. Will she succeed, or will her actions unleash an unstoppable chain of events that could untimately backfire on her?
